title: ICI la France: L'heritage de Napoleon
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Napoleon I, Emperor of the French, 1769-1821

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
People/Napoleon I, Emperor of the French, 1769-1821
History/Napoleon I, Emperor of the French, 1769-1821
description: French language training film - all dialogue is in French. A visit to Prince Murat, a descendant of Napoleon, who describes Napoleon's activities as an administrator, and creator of the Civil Code and the Legion d'Honneur. He also founded a boarding school at St Denis for daughters of members of the Legion d'Honneur. A visit to this school shows how the traditions established by Napoleon are still being maintained.
